title: Harden Windows endpoint protection baseline
objective: Establish comprehensive malware and threat protection across Windows hosts.

title: Standardize Windows privileged access controls
objective: Reduce credential risk through local admin password management and rotation.

title: Enable Windows host network segmentation
objective: Restrict inbound traffic to approved services and sources.

title: Secure Windows remote administration channels
objective: Strengthen RDP and WinRM security posture for administrative access.

title: Protect Windows data-at-rest with encryption
objective: Ensure system drives are encrypted with recoverable keys.

title: Maintain Windows patch currency
objective: Apply security updates within maintenance windows without service disruption.

title: Establish Windows event monitoring pipeline
objective: Forward security and operational events to centralized analysis.

title: Enable PowerShell activity audit trail
objective: Capture script execution and command activity for forensic review.

title: Implement Windows credential protection
objective: Reduce credential theft risk through virtualization-based security.

title: Standardize Windows certificate lifecycle
objective: Automate enrollment and renewal for endpoint authentication certificates.

title: Establish Windows backup recovery capability
objective: Ensure file shares and system state are recoverable within RTO/RPO targets.

title: Harden Windows file service protocols
objective: Disable legacy SMB versions and enforce secure negotiation.
